entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
